properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:16AM MST until January 13 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total
snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with up to 6 inches in the
mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Winter Storm
Watch, heavy snow possible.

* WHERE...Harney County and Malheur County zones.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight MST /11
PM PST/ tonight to 6 AM MST /5 AM PST/ Monday. For the Winter
Storm Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MST /11 PM PST/ TONIGHT TO 6 AM MST /5 AM PST/ MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
